Introduction
This topic contains information on processing simultaneous award adjustments, including
when simultaneous award adjustments
are permitted
, and
are not permitted
, and
procedure when simultaneous award adjustments are not permitted
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Simultaneous Award Adjustments
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
